text: Charlie Chan in Panama is a 1940 American crime mystery movie directed by Norman Foster and is an uncredited remake of the 1934 movie Marie Galante. It stars Sidney Toler, Jean Rogers, Lionel Atwill, Victor Sen Yung, Kane Richmond, Lionel Royce, Jack La Rue, Edwin Stanley, Addison Richards and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 crime movies Category:1940s mystery movies Category:American crime movies Category:American mystery movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Foster Category:Charlie Chan
title: Charlie Chan in Panama
